lead_paragraph: Kenya's doping problems were caused by "foolish" young athletes desperate to win races and cash in on the sport, David Rudisha said on Wednesday, but the Olympic 800 meters champion hopes his country is on the right track to restoring its reputation.

headline.print_headline: Young 'Fools' Behind Kenya Doping Woes: Rudisha
headline.main: Young 'Fools' Behind Kenya Doping Woes: Rudisha
